app.title: Primary care finder
app.subtitle: Free and low-cost medical care in Philadelphia
app.noResults: No health centers found. Please check your spelling or remove some of your filters, and try again.

introPage.section1Title: Find free or low-cost primary care
introPage.p0: Primary care is your health care home. Services include prevention, wellness, and treatment for common illnesses.
introPage.p05: These health centers serve everyone. Your immigration status or ability to pay won't stop you from getting the care you need.
introPage.p1: To find a primary care provider in Philadelphia:

ol1.li1: Filter by the services you need.
ol1.li2: Select the location on the map for details.

introPage.p2: These health centers take many forms of insurance. This includes Medicare and Medicaid. You can get care even if you don't have insurance. If you're uninsured, you'll pay a small fee based on your income and family size.
introPage.p25: Philadelphia's BenePhilly program offers free support to help residents apply for health insurance. To learn more, visit https://www.phila.gov/programs/benephilly.
introPage.p3: All health centers offer phone interpretation services. Some also offer in-person interpretation. View each locationâ€™s details for a list of all languages spoken by staff. You can also search for a specific language.
introPage.p4: You may need to establish care with a provider before you can access some services. Call to schedule a new patient appointment to become a patient at a health center.
introPage.p5: We update the information for each health center every three months. If something is wrong, you can let us know through our

cards.table1Intro: These services may be specialized for children or adults. You may also need to become a patient, or establish care, at a health center before you can access some services.
cards.table2Intro: The rest of the services aren't divided by age. Some are open to anyone, but you may need to establish care at this health center before accessing others.

slidingScaleNull: Sliding scale not provided. Call for more information.
ageSpecificServicesEmpty: This site doesn't offer any services that are limited to children or adults

tests.noTests: This site does not offer any of the tests or imaging listed in the filters. Call to ask about other tests or imaging.

tooltips.women: Includes family planning and gynecological care

warnings.This health center only offers HIV and S: This health center only offers HIV and STD/STI testing and treatment; walk-ins only
warnings.This health center only sees people who: This health center only sees people who are living with HIV.
warnings.COVID-19 vaccines and testing are availa: COVID-19 vaccines and testing are available to everyone. For all other services, this health center only sees people who are immigrants, undocumented, or who speak Spanish.
warnings.Telehealth appointments for established: Telehealth appointments for established patients only. New patient telehealth appointments available only for patients starting Hep C treatment.
warnings.New patients should call on the first We: New patients should call on the first Wednesday of the month to make an appointment.
warnings.The pharmacy is currently closed for con: The pharmacy is currently closed for construction.
